comment.author: 9599527@N05
comment._content: It is amazing how wide the streets were, although they don’t have cars.

comment.author: 28079146@N07
comment._content:
these houses are still here-even the tiny cottage ,tucked between the others on the right.
they've been spruced up a bit since 1875, and there is a proper pavement now, but it's very recognisable.
